use_cases.name: view reports
use_cases.sentence: As a customer, I want to view and download reports so that I sleep

use_cases.name: download reports
use_cases.sentence: As a customer, I want to view and download reports so that I sleep

use_cases.name: browse products
use_cases.sentence: As a shopper, I want to browse products by category, so that I can find items more easily.

use_cases.name: search products
use_cases.sentence: As a shopper, I want to search for products by keyword, so that I can quickly locate specific items.

use_cases.name: view product details
use_cases.sentence: As a shopper, I want to view product details, so that I can decide whether the product meets my needs.

use_cases.name: add products to cart
use_cases.sentence: As a shopper, I want to add products to my cart, so that I can purchase multiple items at once.

use_cases.name: checkout
use_cases.sentence: As a shopper, I want to checkout using multiple payment methods, so that I can choose the most convenient option.

use_cases.name: track orders
use_cases.sentence: As a shopper, I want to track my orders, so that I know the delivery status.

use_cases.name: register account
use_cases.sentence: As a user, I want to register an account, so that I can access personalized features.

use_cases.name: log in
use_cases.sentence: As a user, I want to log in to the system, so that I can securely access my account.

use_cases.name: update profile
use_cases.sentence: As a user, I want to update my profile information, so that my account details remain accurate.

use_cases.name: reset password
use_cases.sentence: As a user, I want to reset my password, so that I can regain access if I forget it.

use_cases.name: download reports
use_cases.sentence: As a user, I want to be able to download reports, so that I can analyze my data offline.

use_cases.name: manage user accounts
use_cases.sentence: As an admin, I want to be allowed to manage user accounts, so that I can control system access.

use_cases.name: approve orders
use_cases.sentence: As a manager, I want to be authorized to approve orders, so that business processes are not delayed.

use_cases.name: configure system settings
use_cases.sentence: As a system operator, I want to be permitted to configure system settings, so that the system can be customized.

use_cases.name: create products
use_cases.sentence: As an admin, I want to create new products, so that they are available for customers to purchase.

use_cases.name: update product prices
use_cases.sentence: As an admin, I want to update product prices, so that pricing information stays current.

use_cases.name: manage inventory
use_cases.sentence: As an admin, I want to manage inventory levels, so that products do not go out of stock.

use_cases.name: view sales reports
use_cases.sentence: As an admin, I want to view sales reports, so that I can monitor business performance.

use_cases.name: log user activities
use_cases.sentence: As a system, I want to log user activities, so that security issues can be detected.
